description: Quincy Rosenkreuz is the Genom chief executive officer, he wishes for humans and boomers to live together peacefully. Though suspicious of Mason`s activities, he believes he can control and maintain Mason. With his body badly decayed, he uses tubes and wires to keep him alive, afraid of using more advanced implants. Mason`s secretary later kills him by disconnecting a vital cord in his life-support system.
name: Quincy Rosenkreuz
